intro.title: Journey of Self-Discovery
intro.description: Discover your MBTI and temperament through 45 questions
intro.existingResult: If you've taken the test before, you can view your results directly.

result.disclaimer: This is just for fun. AI analysis may not be accurate.
result.defaultTitle: A person with rich emotions and deep thinking!
result.defaultDescription:
{name} is someone with rich inner emotions and deep thinking abilities. While open to new ideas and possibilities, you tend to carefully examine decisions from multiple angles.

You excel at empathizing with others' emotions and value harmonious relationships. Creative problem-solving and intuition are your strengths, and you feel most satisfied when deeply immersed in meaningful work.

gallery.title: Browse Others' Results
gallery.disclaimer: This test is for entertainment purposes. AI analysis results are for reference only and may not accurately reflect actual personality or characteristics.
gallery.noResultsHint: Complete the test and be the first to share!
gallery.regenerateError: Failed to regenerate. Please try again later.

error.notFoundDesc: The link is invalid or the results have been deleted.
